title: Ulaga Vaayaadi Lyrics Karuppan
stanzas:
Ulaga vaayaadi
odhungi nee podi
kadhal romba alandha
unna mandhirichi povendi.

Ulaga vaayaadi
odhungi nee podi
oru dhillu irundha nillu
ennathukku poochaandi.

magaraniya irundhaalume
mariyaatha venum venum.
oru aambala mudipodave
mulusaa ne maara venum.

verum vaayila molam podura
vevagaaram yaendi.
adi adiyae.

thallaadinaa adha
ennaanu pesum oore.

oru kalyanam kacheri
pannaamale

edhu nallathu kettadhu
therinji adha seiyanum
pombala purinji.

velaiyaada nenachaale
